extends Scoped

    • Method Detail

      • defaults

        static Finder[] defaults​(Scope scope)

      • findAllIn

        default FinderResult<?> findAllIn​(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                                  java.io.File file)
        Tries to find and load classes from the given files our source root.

        Use the FinderResult.load(Scope) method to load all found classes and to register them with the Scope.

        Parameters:
        classLoader - the classloader that is used to load the classes
        file - the jar file or sources root to search for classes
        Returns:
        the result of the find operation

      • findAllIn

        FinderResult<?> findAllIn​(java.lang.ClassLoader classLoader,
                          java.io.File file,
                          java.util.function.Predicate<java.lang.Class<?>> predicate)
        Finds all classes inside the given path or jar file and loads them using the provided class loading.

        Use the predicate to filter the classes that are loaded.

        Use the FinderResult.load(Scope) method to load all found classes and to register them with the Scope.

        Parameters:
        classLoader - the classloader that is used to load the classes
        file - the jar file or sources root to search for classes
        predicate - the predicate to filter the loaded classes on
        Returns:
        the result of the find operation
